name: The House (itch) (Akema)
description:
Controls

Move - WASD keys

Interact - Spacebar

This game was made for the 48 hours Spooky 2D Jam, might consider redoing this later in the future if this gets a positive feedback. I am a beginner in Unity and in game development in general so having any feedback is very appreciated.

Assets used in this game : 

1) https://assetbakery.itch.io/horror-house-tileset

2)https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/tiny-rpg-forest-114685

Thanks for playing :)

*******SPOILER********

1)Check fridge

2)Check light switch

3)Yellow star on floor IS the key. Pick it up and head to exit.
